revision.text:
{{Wiktionary|Britain}} '''Britain''' usually refers to the [[United Kingdom]], a sovereign state comprising the island of Great Britain, the north-eastern part of the island of Ireland and many smaller islands.
It can also refer to:
*[[Great Britain]], a large island in Western Europe *[[Roman Britain]], a former Roman province corresponding roughly to modern day England and Wales
'''Britain''' may also refer to:
{{TOC right}}
==Places== * [[Britain (place name)]] * [[Britain, Virginia]], an unincorporated community in the United States of America * [[Kingdom of Great Britain]], a sovereign state from 1707 to 1800
==People== * [[Calvin Britain]] (1800â€“1862), an American politician * [[Kristen Britain]], an American novelist
==Other uses== * [[Captain Britain]], a Marvel Comics superhero * [[National sports teams of the United Kingdom]]
